original_title: ฉลุยหิน คนไข่สุดขอบโลก
overview: Tong Tong is a stone man who searches for a new water source. With a companion that is Frank and Jom Jom, although Tong Tong will find things that search for intention But he feels happy with some things that are discovered on the way When he became a water king One day, Tong looked into the swamp. He then realized the painful truth that he had lost his identity.
tagline: This evidence has proven 99 million years.
title: Egg Man
